page.title: 15Champion roller skater
page.content: In 1962 Mr. and Mrs. Colclough won the World Pairs Roller Skating Championship.Their son and daughter are both accomplished skaters. Mr. Colclough worked for the Phillips group of companies as an industrial designer and when he was promoted the family moved from Great Yarmouth to Fen Ditton. Soon afterwards Phillips moved their design operations to Europe and at that time, for family reasons, it was not possible for Mr. Colclough to move, so at the age of 50 he became redundant. After much thought Mr. Colclough decided to become a freelance designer and unexpectedly began to receive commissions from his former employers. He worked 12 hours a day, seven days a week, and at first could not even find time for a holiday.Now he has holidays but still works a 12 hour day.
